duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all aspects of assigned programs throughout project lifecycles to ensure completion within the defined scope, quality, time, and cost constraints.
Manage problem resolution and risk mitigation for escalated issues, problems, and risks as needed.
Ensure accurate allocations of resources throughout the program.
Lead multi-disciplinary teams to create and deploy successful programs.
Serve as liaison between technical and non-technical teams in internal and client organizations to ensure project targets are met.
Deliver informational and decision-seeking presentations to technical and business groups.
Select, develop, and evaluate personnel to ensure the efficient operation of the function.
